Trade/Device Name(s): BD ProbeTec Chlamydia trachomatis (CT) Q Amplified DNA Assay
BD ProbeTec CT Q Amplified DNA Assay
BD ProbeTecTM Chlamydia trachomatis (CT) Q Amplified DNA Assay
BD ProbeTec CT Qx Amplified DNA Assay
BD ProbeTec CT Q* Amplified DNA Assay
BD ProbeTecM Chlamydia trachomatis (CT) Q Amplified DNA Assay
Submitter Information: BD Diagnostic Systems (Becton, Dickinson and Company)
Specimen Container(s): BD ProbeTec Q UPT urine specimen collection device
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD ProbeTec Chlamydia trachomatis Q Amplified DNA Assay, a nucleic acid amplification test for direct qualitative detection of C. trachomatis DNA in swab and urine specimens using the BD Viper System
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of Chlamydia trachomatis DNA in female endocervical and male urethral swabs, patient-collected vaginal swabs, and urine specimens from asymptomatic and symptomatic individuals to aid diagnosis of chlamydial urogenital disease
